recipesJson.name: Peanut butter cookies and cream
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: Super long steep on this one takes a good two weeks before the peanut butter really balances out. The combination of peanut butter works really well to provide a creamy peanut butter cookies. Make sure you shake your peanut butter very very well before you use it one of those flavorings that likes to separate.

reviews.text:
Vaping through this like my life depends on it, with another batch busy steeping. Very tasty.
I get more of a milkshake profile from it, want to tweak it for some grittier texture.
Very creamy peanut buttery goodness, for me it needed 3 weeks to age and was ready to go.
